common.event.statuses.cancelledInfo.value: The event has been permanently cancelled

common.event.statuses.fullInfo.value: New participants are no longer accepted to the event

common.event.statuses.movedOnlineInfo.value: The event will no longer be attended to at a physical location

common.event.statuses.postponedInfo.value: The event has been postponed to dates not yet known

common.event.statuses.rescheduledInfo.value: The timings and/or dates of the event have been modified

common.event.statuses.scheduledInfo.value: The event is scheduled at the indicated location and time
